title: I received the Icon, where is the Mystery Skin?
body:
I just received the Summoner Icon and I already owned Riot Kayle, but I received no Mystery Skin. The Icon shows up in my purchase history but no skin or other gift.

Will this come at a later date or is it hidden?

replies.body: The gifts are being sent out seperately, and due to the large amount of players who are eligible it's going to take a bit.  Stay updated at our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-), and hang on until this is all wrapped up!

Or... we could see a list of the skins we own and what day we got them so we would actually know what we got and what we didn't. I got the icon and kayle and a skin, but there was no notification in purchase history or anything.  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
same here on my smurf account

the gifts are still being distributed, with the 23rd being the final day. If you're absolutely sure you haven't received a mystery gift by then, I'd suggest making a support ticket. #totallydidntcopypaste
I'd just imagine that they would give the icon and the skin together.
since you already have riot kayle you should probably wait
